name: 賴明鈞
objective:
1. 介紹各種連桿機構的動作原理與運動分析
2. 介紹機械元件(例如齒輪與螺旋)的動作原理與設計分析方法
3. 簡介機器動力學的相關理論
schedule:
1. Introduction to machines and mechanisms
2. Kinematic analysis of mechanisms
3. Kinematic analysis of mechanisms
4. Computer-aided mechanism analysis
5. The first exam. /Computer-aided mechanism analysis
6. Analysis and design of machine elements
7. Analysis and design of machine elements
8. Introduction to machine dynamics
9. The second exam.
scorePolicy:
作業成績  佔40%
期中考一  佔30%
期中考二  佔30%
materials:
1. D. H. Myszka, “Machines and Mechanisms,” 3rd Ed., 
   2005, Pearson Education, Inc.
2. 上課講義
